column4: I've just put a new heatsink into a computer that's been off for quite some time. When the computer originally booted, the CPU was at 40degrees. It's steadily risen over the course of about 15 minutes to 46. Should I be worried about this?
If it continues to rise over a few hours, then yes you should be worried. However, a processor is going to get warmer regardless within the first 20 - 30 minutes it's running.
I see. It was one of the more expensive heatsinks - What kind of heat should it be running at?
